byline.contributor: Falih Hassan, Omar al-Jawoshy and Kamil Kakol contributed reporting.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: In parts of the city, the fight never ended. Residents, struggling to get by without running water and electricity, say they are repeatedly targeted by snipers and grenade-dropping drones.
snippet: In parts of the city, the fight never ended. Residents, struggling to get by without running water and electricity, say they are repeatedly targeted by snipers and grenade-dropping drones....

headline.main: In Eastern Mosul, Liberated From ISIS, Battle Rages ‘Day and Night’
headline.print_headline: In Eastern Mosul,  Battle Still Rages  After Liberation
